title: Dr.Asknes Art
content:
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background:#f2f2c2; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 10px;"]]
[[=]]
++++ NOTICE FROM THE FOUNDATION RECORDS AND INFORMATION SECURITY ADMINISTRATION 

Dr.Asknes has a hobby of drawing various SCPs, GOIs, Etc. Even those he never made aware of. Unclear how he acquire much this information, test reveal he no in-depth knowledge of most (or possibly any) of the classified SCP. When questioned he simple stated: **“I write and draw as I live. On a whim. This stuff just comes to me.”** 

Dr.Asknes report for a weekly on Site testing to discover any anonymous abilities, so far all tests have resulted in negative. Dr.Asknes is encourage and provide time to illustrate, so long each one is properly archived. A small research team been assemble to study the various illustrations and quotes for any leads regarding the material. This resulted in [Data Expunged].

-- █████ █████, Director, █████
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[tabview]]
[[Tab SCP-Artwork]] These are the following SCPs has depicted. With some he countered, is required to know about regarding other SCPs, and/or couldn’t possibly known to have existed. Following a visual record the illustrations Dr.Asknes done.

[[collapsible]]
**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6463 |SCP-6463]]] - An Ending**
//“All things grand and minor must embrace their ending. Yet the end isn’t darkness nor horror, simple Serenity.”//
[[<image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4aa2b0bf-5a03-412f-9c8c-dec951f4b9ff/dfaydfv-c5b412f1-f19f-4c7e-9c13-cae22c419e72.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..iJvo_uKyknc4meAhUJb6OO6YGuKWG1kknR6y1c1Ity0]]

**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-1471 |SCP-1471]]] - MalO Ver 1.0.0**
//“Guys, why the hell is there so much porn art of this thing? It’s stuff like that, that make me think humanity deserves be annihilated by these things we lock-up.”//
[[<image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4aa2b0bf-5a03-412f-9c8c-dec951f4b9ff/dfayesb-59e1b02b-d61e-4003-a97a-e15482b0ec09.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..zkcHcjk1uixlLZZqvCiit8biY2aQ-4qswQws654AfxE]]

**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/sandrewswann-s-proposal|SCP-0001 - The Database]]]**
//“Before anyone integrates me or forcible give me mind-chemical crap. I got this from Dr.Clef who yelled to everyone: “God is a bunch horror writers” in the cafeteria. Blame him not me.”//
[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4aa2b0bf-5a03-412f-9c8c-dec951f4b9ff/dezfdfk-78189253-d9b3-4f12-816f-051f183ab2e9.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..hsxn5rU_04DI3aX6wmrSajRKa1xdzMEmKZB3uetU4tU]]

**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-080|SCP-0080]]] - Boogie-Man**
//“Fear is not a challenge be overcome, simple a part of human nature. Simply embrace the darkness.”//
[[<image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4aa2b0bf-5a03-412f-9c8c-dec951f4b9ff/dfayegs-5e87ee9b-575e-4a74-b52a-3c18f2a59671.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..pDy_VRJ6kBTxVQITFrj9ifYiq-0K03TRFaiwJusk4I0]]

**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-1100|SCP-1100 Gaia Blood]]]**
//Even Mother Nature want us dead. Why am I not surprised?//
[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4aa2b0bf-5a03-412f-9c8c-dec951f4b9ff/dfma1ca-b9a08fc4-92b3-4059-b98d-5498d3da1d53.jpg/v1/fill/w_1280,h_1957,q_75,strp/scp_1100_gaia_blood_by_drasknes44376_dfma1ca-fullview.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..OCQN2WWbrkcoSPHUoliz_cf2GYAPYMJFt33LNLNafJk]]

**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5999|SCP-5999]]] - This Is Where I Died**
//Or not.//
[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4aa2b0bf-5a03-412f-9c8c-dec951f4b9ff/dendzke-1471e44b-9062-483d-b19f-2f7decc4f2ac.png/v1/fill/w_1280,h_1956,q_80,strp/scp_5999_this_is_where_i_died_by_drasknes44376_dendzke-fullview.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..FOqxSaL06IYgmZ1kkkRXXRx0m3O1HTgw4TB6LTOIsvY]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[/tab]]
[[tab GOI-Artwork]]
Dr.Asknes also done artwork regarding various group of interest he researched, encountered, or heard reference of. Even left short description of each group illustration often has a comical-tone. 

[[collapsible]]
**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/horizon-initiative-hub|GOI-0016]]] - The Horizon Initiative**
//Bless the lord with bloody knuckles.//
[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4aa2b0bf-5a03-412f-9c8c-dec951f4b9ff/dff1fpd-61be69e1-4978-45af-9366-220aefc8aa5a.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..dSatAbdUtwv32oyFmUx3SuzhQsQs0xtP87JiZvvesQI]]

**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/serpent-s-hand-hub|GOI-0019-A]]] - Serpent Hand**
//“Liberators-Wizards? Or Multiverse-Bookworms?”//
[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4aa2b0bf-5a03-412f-9c8c-dec951f4b9ff/dfayge4-fd54dadc-2645-4bc4-bb0b-de4f72b62654.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..0-oo-lYGHZ9txw5VYQDKYQlYeSfTvcH3WDwURVSJZfc]]

**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/black-queen-hub|GOI-0019-B]]][[footnote]]That’s the number I am going with.[[/footnote]] - The Black Queen**
//I hate multiverse theory, I really do.// 
[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4aa2b0bf-5a03-412f-9c8c-dec951f4b9ff/dfgzg2f-657c87fa-ecb8-4894-b8ec-c9f5bfbf6f50.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..AoNXl32JMuDVTdcPLMO_H7TV49G2XkpOR9dpfHgc4jA]]

**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/saphir-centre |GOI-0051]]] - SAPPHIRE**
//Extremely Left-Leaning Paranormal Athiest. I feel high typing that sentence out.//
[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4aa2b0bf-5a03-412f-9c8c-dec951f4b9ff/dfexqf0-6f27f13e-8e81-47cf-bae2-547c1f90cb79.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..wOxMGyn6mB4Z93o_NRvqWtRR8lNhYZMZhg30aWCE2oI]]

**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/gamers-against-weed-hub|GOI-5869]]] - Gamers Against Weed**
//“Not anartist just anonymous trolls. Of course.”//
[[<image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4aa2b0bf-5a03-412f-9c8c-dec951f4b9ff/dfayfx1-5d05896a-5dd8-4825-bf41-4f7d28d64868.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..13kRq1AnpEF87bxLUTUThfyLqQaxK-xdi12cKmRJnx8]]

**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/vikander-kneed-technical-media-hub|GOI-5889]]] - Vikander-Kneed Technical Media**
//“Their a group without depth. They have no lore or face their operation. But they got a gimmick, and man do they milk it for all it’s worth!”//
[[<image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4aa2b0bf-5a03-412f-9c8c-dec951f4b9ff/dfaygrx-708eda69-58b4-4303-8c1b-99128f709a47.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..QWM7JnU5PgKFPn47KRKfzYc4aKM0e4VHbvSuGKSNyWA]]

author: John Asknes
